title: The Secret Tree-House
description: "This is easy," Sam said. "I always thought it would be much harder than this to dig a cave. It's almost as if it's digging itself."Margaret stared at the hollow under the tree. "Same," she whispered, "look! It IS digging itself."They couldn't see any dirt piling up, but the cave was getting bigger all the time.
author: Ruth Chew
